meanings.definition: Discrimination or prejudice based on physical appearance.
meanings.sent1: The looksist in the office only hired people who fit a certain image.
meanings.sent2: She faced looksist comments about her weight at school.
meanings.sent3: The looksist judge only chose contestants based on their looks for the beauty pageant.
meanings.sent4: The looksist attitude in the fashion industry can be damaging to self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The looksist behavior at the audition made many talented individuals feel unwelcome.

meanings.definition: Someone who discriminates against others based on their looks.
meanings.sent1: The looksist made fun of people who didn't meet their standards of beauty.
meanings.sent2: He was known as a looksist because he judged people solely on their appearance.
meanings.sent3: The looksist at the party only talked to those they considered attractive.
meanings.sent4: Being a looksist can prevent you from seeing the true value in others.
meanings.sent5: The looksist's behavior towards his classmates was hurtful and unfair.
